synopsis.text:
She athed in mystery, colossal robots known as 'Giant Robos (GR)' have begun to wreak havoc across the globe, leaving a trail of destruction in their wake. As the world trembles in fear, Japan braces itself as the next target. Enter Daisaku Kusama, an ordinary young man working at a diving shop in Okinawa, who encounters an enigmatic girl named V. This chance meeting leads Daisaku to an ancient underwater pyramid, where he forms a pact with the mighty Giant Robo 1 (GR1).

In the face of escalating 'armored terrorism' orchestrated by the nefarious Gigantic Rebellion Operators (GRO), Daisaku finds himself genetically modified to merge with GR1, becoming its commander. With the support of the international peacekeeping force UNISOM, Daisaku and GR1 rise to challenge the destructive forces threatening humanity. As the epic battle unfolds, the true purpose of the Giant Robos' power is called into question, hinting at a deeper mystery waiting to be unraveled.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
